onboarding.feature_quick_entry_desc: Log expenses in seconds with voice or text

home.title: Quick Spend
home.features:
You will be able to:
• Add expenses by voice or typing
• View expense list
• See spending statistics
• And much more!
home.delete_expense_message: Are you sure you want to delete this expense? This action cannot be undone.
home.no_expenses_message: Start tracking your spending by adding your first expense using voice or text input.

voice.hold_instruction: Hold the button to record your expense
voice.error: Could not start voice recording. Please check permissions.
voice.permission_rationale: Quick Spend needs access to your microphone and speech recognition to record voice expenses. This allows you to quickly add expenses by speaking.
voice.permission_rationale_android: Quick Spend needs microphone access to record your voice expenses. This allows you to quickly add expenses by speaking.
voice.permission_rationale_ios: Quick Spend needs access to your microphone and speech recognition to record voice expenses. This allows you to quickly add expenses by speaking.
voice.permission_granted: Permissions granted! Hold button to record
voice.permission_denied_message: Voice recording requires microphone and speech recognition permissions. Please grant both permissions in Settings to use this feature.
voice.permission_denied_message_android: Voice recording requires microphone permission. Please grant this permission in Settings to use this feature.
voice.permission_denied_message_ios: Voice recording requires microphone and speech recognition permissions. Please grant both permissions in Settings to use this feature.
voice.permission_settings_hint: Enable Microphone and Speech Recognition in your device Settings app
voice.permission_settings_hint_android: Enable Microphone in your device Settings app
voice.permission_settings_hint_ios: Enable Microphone and Speech Recognition in Settings
voice.tutorial_description: Press and hold the button to record your expense with voice. Release to process.
